::Battera::

She turned and walked down the hall and almost ran into Wolvertron. 
Literally. She was in beast mode and transformed into bot mode.
"AHH! Geeez you scared me." She put her hands on her hips.
"Now why would you go around scaring the armor of a bot like that?"
she said in a sarcastis voice.
"Don't you know that that's not a nice thing to do."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Wolveritron::
> 
>     He stepped out of the bushes expecting to find a bot who wanted 
to mess 
> with him, instead he found nothing.
>     "Great, I'm known now for nothing, well I better make the best 
of it," He 
> put his claws away and entered the base.
